summary:
Entrepreneur, blogger & all-round marketing & media specialist with 20+ years of online experience in the field of web development, (web) research, SEO/SEA, viral/video marketing, social media marketing, community management, media planning, strategy, advice.

Passionately worked on digital campaigns for global brands: Shell, Nike, Heineken, Samsung, KLM, Red Bull, IBM, GlaxoSmithKline, Motorola, Ford, IKEA, Paramount, Nokia, Blackberry, AB InBev, Chrysler, Emirates, Orangina Schweppes, Shimano, Maersk, Abbott, Soda-Club, LG & local brands XS4ALL, Bavaria, Sportvisserij, Wegener, WNF, Simyo, Honda NL, Belastingdienst.

Phone: +31625104047
Skype: paulvanveenendaal

projects.title: Team member & Advisor AsianCliq
projects.description: AsiancliQ is a social and business multi-platform network organization for Asians and everyone who has an affinity with Asia. The AsiancliQ platform is rapidly expanding across Europe and connects organisations, entrepreneurs, professionals and students via internet and events. Over 150,000 people have joined the AsiancliQ network.

projects.title: Co-founder & Blogger ViralBlog
projects.description:
ViralBlog.com provides marketers around the globe with fresh shots of viral and social media trends, news and case studies. ViralBlog is ranked in the top 50 of the AdAge Power 150. 
ViralBlog has monthly 70.000 unique visitors, 120.000 pageviews, 11.000 Twitter followers, (November 2012). ViralBlog is read by major advertising & media agencies and top international brands.

projects.title: Guest Editor, Speaker, Social Media Editor & Curator
projects.description:
• Guest editor in January 2009 & January 2010 (The Best Virals of 2008 & 2009)
• As speaker I presented a customized version of Upload Cinema to VU Medisch Centrum at Symposium 'Besmet' together with Barbara de Wijn
• As Curator I'm part of the central editorial team and take part in the entry selection process 
• As Social Media Editor I contributed to De Lange Nacht van de Korte Film (Theme viral). Broadcasted live by the NTR on September 2nd 2011 in Skylounge (Mint Hotel)
• Conducted research for "YouTube Turns 5" edition in Stadsschouwburg Amsterdam on February 22/23 2010

About Upload Cinema:
Upload Cinema is a film club that takes the best web films to the big screen in theaters in The Netherlands, Belgium, Spain and Turkey. Winner of a Cannes Lion and Spin Award. Nominated at the prestigious Webby Awards and The D&AD (British Design And Art directors Club). 

See http://www.uploadcinema.net
See http://www.facebook.com/uploadcinema

projects.description:

• Initiator of Viral Friday and WK Top 100 (in cooperation with zibb.nl, part of Reed Business).

About Marketingfacts:
Marketingfacts.nl, founded in November 2002 by Marco Derksen, is one of the most popular blogs in the Netherlands on interactive marketing and new media. Marketingfacts.nl is read by 200,000 unique visitors each month. In 2006 Marketingfacts won a Dutch Bloggie award in the category Best Theme Blog

profile_positions.description:
NPB Media is al 85 jaar actief als outdoor-mediaexploitant voor lokale, regionale en landelijke ondernemers en overheidsinstellingen. De dienstverlening strekt zich uit over vrijwel alle gemeenten in Nederland – NPB heeft met 170 gemeenten een concessie gesloten. Als exploitant van ruim 16.000 reclamevlakken is NPB marktleider van lichtmastreclame in Nederland.

Zie voor meer info: https://www.npbmedia.nl
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketeer

profile_positions.description:
iris is an award-winning global creative innovation network that works with clients such as Sony Mobile, adidas, MINI, Domino’s, Costa Coffee, Shell, Reckitt Benckiser, Heineken and Barclaycard.

I performed the role of Community Manager on the Shell account within iris Amsterdam.

• Creation and development of retail content for Shell NL Facebook and the Shell Motorist App
• Align content with “Welcome to Shell” objectives and Shell digital guidelines
• Liaise with Shell NL Retail team and Group social media community manager at Shell
• Work together with Shell’s media agency, PR agency and other Shell partners
• Writing social media posts and advice on imagery for content pillars, promotions, global content for local market
• Content Pillars: Heritage, On the road, Car Care, CVP’s, Voice of the Customer
• Promotions: Shell V-Power, Tank & Profiteer (Shell/Philips), Tank & Dineer (Shell/IENS), Summer promotion
• Localizing assets, based on global package, for the local market: Station Stories, Shell V-Power: Kiss Car Cam
• Setting up and execute sweepstakes in partnership with Shell Motorsport, Philips, &Samhoud and Shell Lubricants.
• Active monitoring and moderation on a daily basis through Adobe Social and Sprinklr
• Resolving social media issues together with Shell departments, CSC and the group social media community manager
• Advisor in case of crisis management and partner to discuss public opinion and (retail) brand reputation 
• Creation of weekly social listening report for Shell retail, marketing, PR, loyalty, corporate team
• Periodically share "Service beyond the Forecourt" success examples with Shell Global
• Analytics: Engagement reports for Shell NL Retail team and Shell Global
profile_positions.title: Community Manager

profile_positions.description:
Starcom MediaVest Group (SMG) is the Human Experience Company with more than 8,000 employees in 130 offices worldwide. Human understanding is at the centre of everything we do. People and experiences are our purpose and the heart of our business. SMG has been named Network of the Year in 2013/2014 at the Festival of Media and at Cannes Lions in 2014. 

SMG and LiquidThread are part of Publicis Groupe, the world's third largest communications group. LiquidThread (part of SMG) creates experiences through branded entertainment and storytelling. 

My role within SMG/LiquidThread A'dam: Support colleagues/clients through Insights, Ideas, Implementation & Influence.

Insights
- Social media insights/analysis: consumers, brands & markets
- Social media listening/monitoring
- Influencer identification
- Opportunity prospecting & innovation
- Social media benchmarking
Ideas
- Social media brainstorming
- Concepting & ideation for social media channels 
Implementation
- Seeding consultancy & execution 
- Community & content management
- On-going social media brand management
- Ambassador programme
Influence
- Exert expertise on blogs, conferences, social media

Highlights:
• Support SMG's Heineken local team (including Vrumona brands) & international hub team
• Support Samsung team in various campaigns for Galaxy, Note, NX, Ecobubble, Curved, SmartTV 
• Support client leader responsible for GSK (Aquafresh/Niquitin), Emirates, BlackBerry
• Other brands worked on: Red Bull, King.com, Nintendo. Novartis, RVD, Van Haren, ABN AMRO
• Part of Marketing team (including management)
• Social media management of @StarcomNL across 10 channels 
• Top 100 most followed on SMG Yammer, ranked 85 out of 8000.
• First to arrange Google Glass within SMG worldwide 
• Contributed in pitches for UPC, Kraft, World of Tanks
• Presentation "Curated Marketplaces" at Samsung HQ in Delft for 15 Samsung executives

See http://www.starcom.nl
See http://www.fb.com/StarcomNL
See http://www.fb.com/StarcomUSA
profile_positions.title: Social Media & Community Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for digital mediaplanning/buying, media strategy, search, mobile and social media marketing
• Planned online campaigns for IBM, XS4ALL, Sportvisserij Nederland up to € 500.000 budget
• Planned one of the most cost effective campaigns for IBM SPSS: € 10.000 resulted 
in 700+ whitepaper signups
• Contributed in pitches for Philips, ING, Rabobank, Kentucky Fried Chicken 
• Collaborated on social media, mobile, search projects for Unilever, BP, American Express, Deloitte
• Assisted Ogilvy Singapore in blogger outreach for Pond’s 
• Think Digital and Do Digital trainer for Ogilvy Amsterdam office
• Performed research Digital Insights (Benelux) for IBM Worldwide Digital Team
• Managing a trainee (10 weeks)
• Blogging for Ogilvy Amsterdam’s creative inspiration blog Blogilvy.nl 
• Neo@Ogilvy is a unit of Ogilvy & Mather, a WPP company 

About Neo@Ogilvy:
Neo@Ogilvy is a fully integrated division of OgilvyOne Worldwide and is a full-service digital media agency offering media strategy, planning and buying, search marketing, performance marketing, analytics and technology, mobile marketing, social media marketing and related services.

The agency launched in 2006 and currently operates 33 offices in 25 countries and is headed by Neo@Ogilvy's global CEO, Nasreen Madhany. 

Ogilvy & Mather was named Network of the Year at the 59th Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity (2012).

See http://www.ogilvy.nl
See http://www.facebook.com/ogilvyamsterdam
